system.description: “Sometimes all you need is a better connection.” Once per Scene, you can reroute local energy or data flow. Choose one ally within Close range; they gain +1 to their next roll that involves technology or reflexes.
system.effect: Once per Scene, you can reroute local energy or data flow. Choose one ally within Close range; they gain +1 to their next roll that involves technology or reflexes.
system.blurb: “Sometimes all you need is a better connection.”
